*******************

### Tender Notice: Inspection Services for Boilers, Pressure Vessels, and Piping Systems

**Title**: Inspection Services for Boilers, Pressure Vessels, and Piping Systems

**Reference Number**: WS3713861753-Doc3839978414

**Publication Date**: March 20, 2023

**Tender Closing Date**: May 23, 2023, at 2:00 p.m. EDT

**Contracting Authority**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

**Contact Information**:

* Diane Drouin (SPAC/PSPC) - diane.drouin@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Purpose

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites bids from qualified contractors to provide inspection services for boilers, pressure vessels, and piping systems in accordance with the requirements of the Canadian Occupational Health and Safety Regulations (COHSR). The work will be conducted at various locations throughout the National Capital Region (NCR).

### Specifications

* The inspection services will include:
	+ Inspecting boilers, pressure vessels, and piping systems to ensure compliance with COHSR requirements
	+ Conducting safety inspections to identify potential hazards and recommendations for improvement
* The period of any resulting contract will be for a period of 5 years

### Security Requirements

* Security clearance is required for this contract
* Bidders must communicate with the Contracting Authority to confirm attendance and provide the name(s) and date of birth(s) of the person(s) holding a valid security clearance at the required level

### Site Visit

* A site visit is optional and will be held on April 18, 2023, at 10:00 a.m. EDT at 3701 Carling Avenue, Ottawa
* Bidders must confirm attendance with the Contracting Authority by April 3, 2023, at 2:00 p.m. EDT

### Submissions

* All required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be submitted by May 10, 2023, at 2:00 p.m. EDT
* Bids submitted after this time will be considered non-responsive

### Trade Agreements

* This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:
	+ Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
	+ Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
	+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
